entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the main character in the conversation. He is described as not answering to 'Tempted by what?' and having a conversational tone when asking Snape about his life expectancy.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is another main character in the conversation. He is described as sounding furious and hesitant when answering Dumbledore's questions.

entities.name: ring
entities.description: The ring is a cursed object that has been trapped by Snape. It is described as having an extraordinary power to contain it.

relationships.description: Dumbledore expresses gratitude towards Snape for his help in containing the curse.
Snape has trapped the curse of the ring in one hand.
